entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hornepayne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.9°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 23.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
